projects.title: Streemer
projects.descr: Cross-platform application that collects multiple streaming websites in one application. This is a Ionic+Cordova application.

projects.title: CloudComics
projects.descr: Cross-platform application that lets you read comic books(.cbr and .cbz format) from your cloud storage. This project is done with Ionic+Cordova.

projects.title: SimCV
projects.descr: This is my bachelor thesis. It shows how the OpenCV library can be used together with the Android camera.

projects.title: ShopList
projects.descr: The first Android application I ever created was a shopping list, and it was not very good in terms of code and design. Now that I know Android better I decided to recreate the shopping list application.

projects.title: Firestorm
projects.descr: Remote control for a gas fireplace, built with Raspberry Pi and Android. Raspberry Pi runs a Python or a Go http server, which responds to GET requests from a Android application.

projects.title: pictureSort
projects.descr: Copies and sorts all the pictures in the Windows picture folder into a new folder. Pictures are sorted by date. Goal of this project is to learn C#. Still has some bugs and features missing.

projects.title: School Assignments
projects.descr: These assignments includes web, Java, C, and Go programming.
